Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor cleared the bases with a grand slam in the bottom of the sixth, staking the Mets to a 4-1 lead
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies fans expressed heartbreak and frustration over the loss, with one fan joking about needing therapy or an institution to cope
Miscellaneous Highlights: The loss marked the end of the Phillies' magical regular season, which saw them finish with a 95-67 record and earn the No. 2 seed in the NL playoffs
Others: 69 News interviewed fans at a Philadelphia bar during the game, capturing their reactions to the loss
